summary: REQ-6 appears implemented via a new AdminStatusIndicator component rendered in the global Header with a manual refresh (refetch) action. REQ-5 cannot be confirmed as complete from the diff because the updated DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md content shown is truncated/garbled and does not visibly include the required end-to-end draft+live procedure and verification checklist details.

missing_requirements.requirement: Complete `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md` with an end-to-end, copy/paste-ready redeploy procedure for BOTH draft and live, including final verification steps to confirm the bootstrap admin principal is recognized as admin using the existing Admin Panel diagnostics UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for `frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md` is truncated/incorrectly structured (it cuts off right after 'Step 1' and then shows unrelated content), so the required concrete steps for clean install/build, deploying canisters, deploying the frontend, repeating for both draft and live, and the explicit verification checklist referencing the bootstrap principal cannot be verified as present.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `frontend-file-summaries.txt` with narrative summaries of many frontend files (including claims about other changes like Tailwind class fixes, video support, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested changes to `frontend-file-summaries.txt`; this appears to be ancillary documentation/metadata work not tied to REQ-5 or REQ-6.
